class.name: Semaphore
class.description: A synchronization semaphore which can be used to synchronize multiple [Thread]s. Initialized to zero on creation. Be careful to avoid deadlocks. For a binary version, see [Mutex].

method.name: post
method.description: Lowers the [Semaphore], allowing one more thread in.

method.name: try_wait
method.description: Like [method wait], but won't block, so if the value is zero, fails immediately and returns [constant ERR_BUSY]. If non-zero, it returns [constant OK] to report success.

method.name: wait
method.description: Waits for the [Semaphore], if its value is zero, blocks until non-zero.
